job_title: SQL Server DBA with Anyone certification of MCTS or MCITPs or MVP
jd:
Position: SQL Server DBA with Anyone certification of MCTS/MCITPs/MVP
Location: Remote (Need Only EST/CST candidate)
Desired years of experience: 8+ Years
Visa required: USC/GC

Project Summary
The successful candidate will be responsible for the development and sustainment of the SQL Server Warehouse, ensuring its operational readiness (security, health, and performance), assisting in executing data loads, and performing data modeling in support of multiple development teams. Must be effective working independently as well as collaboratively.

Essential Functions
The SQL Server DBA will be responsible for the implementation, configuration, maintenance, and performance of critical SQL Server RDBMS systems, to ensure the availability and consistent performance of our corporate applications. They will also support the deployment processes for both Data Engineering & Analytics and Software Engineering Teams.

Top Five Skills Required
3+ years MS SQL Server Administration experience required.
Experience with Performance Tuning and Optimization for a large-scale data warehouse.
Experience installing and configuring new SQL Servers (preferably SQL Server 2016/2017 and above), some experience in Azure or AWS cloud computing is preferred.
Experience with backups, restores, security audits/access control, recovery models, Disaster Recovery Options (DR), database shrink operations, DBCC commands, Clustering, Database mirroring, database Replication.
Experience in writing complex SQL queries for data retrieval and manipulation. Understanding of Stored Procedures, Triggers, Functions, Indexes, Views is a must.
Understanding of T-SQL along with deep understanding of at least one scripting language such as PowerShell, or Python.
Experience in deploying and monitoring SQL Server Analysis Services, Integration Services, and Reporting Services environments.
Performance Tuning including query rewrites, index changes, server configuration changes and or hardware scaling.
To support software engineering deployments, knowledge of Microservices, REST, JVM (Java - Spring, Spring Boot, Hibernate), NodeJS is a must.
Understanding of Java, J2EE, Javascript, Python, YAML, JSON programming.
Experience working with Windows server, including Active Directory and some understanding of networking such as firewalls etc.
Experience with SSIS/Alteryx, SSRS, and Power BI.

Nice to have skills
MCTS, MCITP, and/or MVP certifications a plus.

Education
Bachelor's
